## General GIS

- [Esri Spatial Statistics Resources](https://spatialstats-analysis-1.hub.arcgis.com/) ~ Tutorials on using spatial analysis tools in the Esri environment.

- [EPSG Projections](https://epsg.io/) ~ Projection codes and help selecting projections

- [Mapping in ggplot with sf](https://r-spatial.org/r/2018/10/25/ggplot2-sf-3.html)

## Data Sources

- [lterdatasampler](https://lter.github.io/lterdatasampler/) ~ R package with sample LTER data
- [Open Land Map](https://openlandmap.org) ~ Data portal to the world's environmental data
